page.title: 08 Friary Grange Sports Centre
page.content: The centre is part of the Friary Grange School. It is situated on the North side of Lichfield and has facilities for many sports. I am in the Lichfield swimming club and the centre is our home pool. The club teaches a range of swimmers and there are many galas and competitions throughout the year. Many of my friends use the gymnastics hall and the squash courts. At the centre you can have judo and karate lessons, play badminton and table tennis and use the new fitness centre. During the summer holidays there are organised courses where you can improve your swimming, tennis, football, and badminton skills.
